

;m-c-hardcopy.prg ==0801==
   20 rem=================================
   30 rem=     multi-color-hardcopy      =
   40 rem=                               =
   50 rem= fuer c-64 und epson fx/rx-80  =
   60 rem=                               =
   70 rem=karsten klenz,harburger str. 24=
   80 rem=2105 seevetal 1,tel.:04105/2695=
   90 rem=================================
 1000 dim a%(422)
 1010  
 1020 for t=1 to 422
 1030   read a%(t)
 1040   s=s+a%(t)
 1050 next t
 1060  
 1070 if s<>43018 then print"fehler in datas !":stop
 1080  
 1090 input"startadresse ";ad
 1100 for t=1 to 16
 1110   read b
 1120    a=a%(b+2)+a%(b+3)*256+ad
 1130    a%(b+2)=a-int(a/256)*256:a%(b+3)=int(a/256)
 1140 next t
 1200  
 1210 for t=1 to 422
 1220   poke ad+t-1,a%(t)
 1230 next t
 1240  
 1250 open1,8,14,"@:m-c-hrdcpy"+str$(ad)+",p,w"
 1260 print#1,chr$(ad-int(ad/256)*256)chr$(int(ad/256));
 1270 for t=1 to 422:print#1,chr$(a%(t));:next t
 1280 close 1
 1290 end
